title: amended by section 6 of the Electoral (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2009 (No. 9
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Local Elections (Disclosure of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Local Elections (Disclosure of 
Donations and Expenditure) Act 1999 (Variation of Monetary Amounts) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited local election (disclosure donation expenditure) act 1999 (variation monetary amounts) order

title: amended by section 6 of the Electoral (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2009 (No. 9
amended by section 6 of the Electoral (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2009 (No. 9
heading: 2. The monetary amounts specified in paragraph (a) (substituted by
text_raw:
2. The monetary amounts specified in paragraph (a) (substituted by 
section 5(4) of the Local Government Reform Act 2014 (No. 1 of 2014)) of 
subsection (1) of section 12A of the Local Elections (Disclosure of Donations 
and Expenditure) Act 1999 (No. 7 of 1999) are varied - 

(a) 

in subparagraph (i), to €15,350, in lieu of €13,000, 

(b) 

in subparagraph (ii), to €13,600, in lieu of €11,500, and 

(c) 

in subparagraph (iii), to €11,500, in lieu of €9,750. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 April, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [134] 3

title: amended by section 6 of the Electoral (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 2009 (No. 9
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends section 12A(1)(a) of the Local Elections (Disclosure of 
Donations and Expenditure) Act 1999 (No. 7 of 1999) to provide for increases, 
having regard to changes in the consumer price index, in the aggregate of 
election expenses that may be incurred by or on behalf of candidates at local 
elections. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [134] 

€ 1.50 

(FS-24) 30. 4/24. Propylon.
